name: ToolJet
description: ToolJet is an open-source low-code framework to build and deploy internal tools.

TOOLJET_HOST.description: Public URL of ToolJet installation. This is usually https://<app-name-in-first-step>.herokuapp.com

TOOLJET_SERVER_URL.description: URL of ToolJet server installation. (This is same as the TOOLJET_HOST for Heroku deployments)

LOCKBOX_MASTER_KEY.description: Master key for encrypting datasource credentials.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: Used by ToolJet server as the input secret to the application's key generator.

NODE_OPTIONS.description: Node options configured to increase node memory to support app build

DISABLE_SIGNUPS.description: Disable sign up in login page only applicable if Multi-Workspace feature is turned on

scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test:e2e --prefix server
